Howard Integritas Solutions Ltd (HISL)

Hero

Sovereign AI, built on the ground — for the ground.

I’m Michael Howard MCIOB, a hands-on Chartered Construction Manager working in the field, delivering projects in pharma, energy, and manufacturing.

I founded HISL and built our platform IntegAI because the tools I needed didn’t exist: AI that works inside regulated environments, cuts downtime, and drives sustainability — without leaking data to the cloud or breaking compliance.

What sets us apart:

  • Built from the field up — designed by someone delivering projects daily.
  • Sovereign by design — data stays under your control, within your jurisdiction.
  • Auditable & ethical — every run is logged, hashed, and replayable.
  • Energy-aware — orchestration minimises carbon footprint and shows the true energy cost of AI.
  • Human + AI partnership — practical expertise amplified by transparent intelligence.

From pain points to practical outcomes

Capabilities

Blind spots create risks

Identify hazards before they occur.
On-site sensing + AI oversight reveal weak signals early — from safety non-conformances to asset drift.

Inefficiency drains resources

Optimize performance in-line.
Continuous tuning keeps throughput high, resources lean, and downtime low across teams and shifts.

Sustainability is fragmented

Measure what matters.
Track impact, cut waste, and prove emissions reductions with evidence that stands up to audit.

Technology with sovereignty at its core

Product Features

  • ComplianceGuard — GDPR/NIS2 monitoring with human-readable evidence.
  • DataSovereign — local-first processing keeps sensitive data in-region.
  • PrivacyShield — encrypted channels, hardened agent comms.
  • AuditTrail — immutable logs with prompt/response hashing.
  • EthicsCore — human-aligned decision rules with escalation paths.
  • SecureComms — enforced encryption and access control.
  • DocuGenie — document intelligence tailored for regulated industries.
  • BuildLens — construction ops insight: RAMS, QA/QC, handover.
Engineering with human dignity

Ethos

Then prove we now with best endeavour,
What from our efforts yet may spring;
He justly is despised who never
Did thought to aid his labours bring;
For this is Art’s true indication,
When skill is minister to thought,
When types that are the mind’s creation —
The hand to perfect form has wrought.

— Family verse, adapted

IntegAI Simulation

Type a prompt, see how requests are traced and audited in real time.
This preview runs in Simulation Mode when live keys aren’t available.

  • Badge: IntegAI Simulation Mode
  • Output JSON includes: runId, promptHash, responseHash
  • Metrics row: tokens, estimated energy (Wh), hops

Projects Matrix

A live dashboard of HISL’s active and experimental systems — from Raven Orchestrator managing fleets of agents, to Compliance Core automating oversight, to Quantum Defense Grid in research.

Each card shows:

  • Status (Active, Development, Research, Planned)
  • Progress percentage
  • Domain focus (Infrastructure, Security, Intelligence, Network)

Together they demonstrate a single principle: sovereign, observable, auditable AI — built for mission-critical environments.

Single source of truth for HISL site

Website Schema & Design Contract

HISL Website Schema

This document defines the information architecture, design tokens, hero spec, globe page, and acceptance criteria for the HISL website.
It acts as the living contract between content, design, and implementation.

Pass 1 --- Global Style System + Apple-Style Hero

Goal: Apply a premium, Apple-style system across the site. Rebuild the Hero with layered imagery + scroll polish.
Do not remove sections --- refine and enhance.

Design Tokens (Tailwind)

  • Fonts: Inter (UI) + Spectral (poem / display)
  • Colors:
    • bg: #0b1220
    • panel: #0f1828
    • edge: #1e2a42
    • text: #e8f0ff
    • muted: #a8b8d6
    • gold: #f6c650
    • teal: #39d7c9
  • Layout: container max-width 1200px, generous paddings (px-6 md:px-8, py-24)
  • Typography:
    • H1 = clamp(40px, 6vw, 80px), tight tracking\
    • H2 = clamp(24px, 3vw, 40px)\
    • Body = 18--19px desktop

Buttons

  • Primary: subtle gold gradient, rounded-xl, shadow, hover lift
  • Secondary: ghost, edge border, soft glow hover

Hero (Landing)

  • Headline: AI + Human... with soul.\
  • Subline: Sovereign AI agents that respect your data, privacy, and humanity.\
  • CTAs:
    • Start a Demo → scrolls to chat preview\
    • Explore the Globe → routes to /globe
  • Visuals:
    • dna_bg.png faint (opacity 6--10%)\
    • Radial vignette edges darkened\
    • Foreground parallax DNA/silhouette accent\
    • Mini-globe badge (240--300px) on right

MiniGlobe Teaser

  • Lightweight Three.js canvas
  • Slow autorotation
  • Warmer, realistic shading + gold rim-light
  • Ravens: /images/raven_huginn.png & /images/raven_muninn.png in distinct slow orbits

Features Grid

  • 2--4 columns responsive, equal card heights
  • Soft glass look (bg-panel/70 + border + shadow)
  • Hover: raise + glow

Poem / Ethos

  • Background: reach_stars.png (5--8% opacity) with radial mask
  • Typography: Spectral, 20--22px, 1.5--1.6 line-height
  • Poem text:
    > Then prove we now with best endeavour, what from our efforts yet may spring, he justly is despised who never, did thought to aid his labours bring; for this is Art's true indication, when skill is minister to thought, when types that are the mind's creation --- the hand to perfect form has wrought.
  • Caption: --- Family verse, adapted

Footer

  • HISL logo + tagline: Smart Solutions, Solid Foundations
  • Links: Substack, LinkedIn (open in new tab)
  • Legal: © 2025 Howard Integritas Solutions Ltd · Reg. No. 786214

Pass 2 --- Full Globe Page

Goal: Upgrade /globe into the marquee experience: realistic Earth, data-centre overlay, ravens, pulse-lines, prompt → output simulation.

Globe Visuals

  • High-quality textures: earth_daymap.jpg, earth_nightmap.jpg, earth_clouds.jpg
  • Atmosphere shader (thin blue rim), subtle bloom
  • Camera autorotate, touch/scroll drag

Ravens

  • Huginn + Muninn (real gold assets) in distinct orbits (different inclinations & speeds)
  • Small gold trail dots, fading, no placeholder rings

Data-Centre Overlay

  • Jurisdiction pins (EU, NA, LATAM, AFR, APAC, etc. full list included)
  • Hover/tap: label + provider
  • Heatmap overlay (faint)

Prompt Simulation (IntegAI Mode)

  • Left column: textarea, Run button, output panel
  • On submit:
    1. Pick 2--3 hops (eg: Dublin → Frankfurt → Ashburn)\
    2. Animate pulse along path (ravens lead)\
    3. Return pulse to output box\
    4. Reveal text + metrics
  • Metrics row: tokens, energy estimate (Wh), hops
  • Badge: "IntegAI Simulation Mode" (with logo)
  • JSON output includes: runId, promptHash, responseHash

API & Stability

  • Defensive fetch w/ try/catch, timeout, graceful error
  • If env key missing: show banner "Live responses offline; running local simulation."
  • UI names: "HISL Sovereign Assistant" / "IntegAI Simulation" (no vendor branding)

Acceptance Criteria

  1. Hero is premium, CTAs functional, scroll smooth.\
  2. MiniGlobe bright, ravens orbit smoothly.\
  3. Feature cards uniform & elegant.\
  4. Poem renders exact text with faint star background.\
  5. Footer logo + legal correct, links working.\
  6. /globe: realistic Earth, atmosphere + clouds, ravens, data-centres, pulse simulation.\
  7. Reduced-motion disables parallax + heavy motion.\
  8. Lighthouse ≥ 90 (mobile + desktop).\
  9. Errors never blank screen; users see branded error.

Asset Map

  • /public/images/dna_bg.png --- Hero accent\
  • /public/images/reach_stars.png --- Poem backdrop\
  • /public/images/raven_huginn.png --- Gold raven 1\
  • /public/images/raven_muninn.png --- Gold raven 2\
  • /public/images/integai_logo.svg --- Badge for IntegAI Simulation\
  • /public/assets/earth_daymap.jpg\
  • /public/assets/earth_nightmap.jpg\
  • /public/assets/earth_clouds.jpg

Optional Micro-Interactions

  • Sticky nav: blur + border + active section highlight\
  • Features: staggered reveal, inner glow on hover\
  • Buttons: 150--200ms spring, shadow shift\
  • Typography: light tracking, optical margin tweaks\
  • Reduced motion: turn off parallax, keep fades only
A sovereignty visualizer

Where Your Prompts Go

Where Your Prompts Go

This interactive globe shows the hidden journey of your AI requests.
When you enter a prompt, it doesn't simply vanish into "the cloud." Instead:

  • Your request is dispatched across real-world data centers.\
  • Our golden ravens, Huginn & Muninn, guide the path as guardians of memory and foresight.\
  • Regional pins show where compute is happening --- Europe, North America, Asia, Africa, and beyond.\
  • Pulse packets trace each network hop, making the flow fully auditable.

Why it matters

Today's AI feels weightless, but every token you generate consumes energy and often leaves your jurisdiction.
By visualizing the route, HISL makes sovereignty tangible: you can see where your data flows and where it is stored.

Key Features

  • 3D Earth with day map, cloud layer, and smooth orbit controls.\
  • Data-center pins for Dublin, Frankfurt, Ashburn, Tokyo, Singapore, São Paulo, and more.\
  • Huginn & Muninn sprites in golden orbit, symbolizing watchfulness and return.\
  • Simulation mode --- type a prompt, watch the packet travel, and receive your answer.\
  • Energy demo --- an estimated joule count shows the hidden cost of AI inference.

The Message

AI should be auditable, sovereign, and observable.
This visualizer turns invisible infrastructure into a living map, reinforcing HISL's mission:
> Your data, your energy, your control --- never outsourced without sight.

Run Simulation
